display.title: Flux-Infused Sickle
display.description:
Performs radial sweeping attacks when swung, regardless of whether a mob is directly hit. Accepts the sweeping edge enchantment.

Empowered: Only damages adult (non-baby) mobs. Exclusively breaks "mature" plants, such as fully grown crops, melons/pumpkin blocks (not stems), non-base sugarcane/cactus/kelp/vine/bamboo blocks, natural leaf blocks, tall grass/flowers, and big dripleaves.
